0: LOS ANGELES â€“ A man in his mid-20s was in custody today and facing charges including car theft and felony evasion after a vehicle pursuit that ended near Los Angeles Police Department headquarters. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The 22-minute pursuit of the stolen Honda Civic began in West Los Angeles around 10:05 p.m. Thursday and ended with two police cruisers slowing and then stopping the vehicle on West First Street, between City Hall and the headquarters building. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Broadcast footage of the pursuit showed the Honda being driven on sidewalks and weaving in and out of near-stalled traffic on the northbound lanes of the Harbor (110) Freeway. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR LAPD Sgt. Brian Cook said the vehicle was reported stolen Thursday from San Gabriel. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Two female passengers were taken into custody at the end of the pursuit, along with the driver.
